The decor is classy and sophisticated, with plenty of lighting (2) The concierge is one of the nicest and most helpful I've ever encountered. Everyone is smiling and helpful. They go out of their way to help you. When I asked if they might have some bubble wrap lying around so I could wrap my wine and place it in my suitcase, one of the gentlemen proceeded to double wrap my bottle of wine with paper, padding and tape...and took great care to do it well. The bottle could've been dropped off the building and it wouldn't have shattered. The service is quick as well. (3) The neighborhood is grand. Don't stay in the touristy areas if you can help it because they are overpriced and don't allow you a sense of what Paris is like. The 6th arrondissement is ideal because it's chic, preppy and clean, is close to all the sites by metro (or walking to the Jardins du Luxembourg) for instance, and is near a lot of great, authentic French restaurants and bars. Who wants to spend time in Paris surrounded by a bunch of Americans. Get the real French experience...and the location of the Hotel Le Six will provide that. (4) Housekeeping is fantastic. The rooms are spotless and the towels are warming up when you return. Their response time is great too. They check up on you once or twice during the day to turn down the bed etc. I could probably go on and on. The company paid for my stay which is lucky for me because it wasn't cheap. But it's worth every penny. I highly recommend this hotel and encourage everyone to stay here. I will definitely return on my next trip out to Paris.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: Angie059
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Hotel Le Six for 2 days and the staff made us feel at home. They go the extra mile to make your stay as comfertable as possible(except the guy who served us breakfast on the 18 March, he was so rude.)but everything and everyone else was perfect. I would recommend this hotel without a doubt. The decor is amazing as well...

Reviews.Title: “Le Bohemienne”
Reviews.Author: Fedinaina
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for two nights and it was a really great experience. It is very well located, being very close to two main metro stations, Montparnasse and Notre-Dame-des-Champs. And just a walk away from the Luxembourg garden! Very modern with a bohemienne touch, very friendly and helpful staff. Great, puffy pillows, free sleepers and soft towels. Just great! Not to mention the comfortable bed! Anyone travelling to Paris I believe you should stop by. It offers a great service compared to the price. Very good hotel away from downtown chaos, but still close to main attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Easy access to fairgrounds”
Reviews.Author: Jeffnycus
Reviews.Content: Was in Paris for the food fair and stayed at Hotel Le Six. Very conveniant location as it is only 15 minutes away by subway to the fairgrounds, but as well 15 minutes to the Champs Elysees. Stayed in room 501 which was spacious and very quiet. Great staff, enjoyed the breakfast buffet which was different evey morning. Jeff Kalinsky

Reviews.Title: “Modern comfortabel rooms with wooden floors in Paris”
Reviews.Author: Lahaye
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in hotel Le Six in Paris in February. I was surprized, because the hotel is very modern and beautifully decorated. The rooms are very comfortabel and very quiet. The lobby where you can find the bar is very cozy. The spa is very professional.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay in a charming hotel in paris”
Reviews.Author: CharlyDublin
Reviews.Content: I have just returned from a 3 night stay in this charming hotel in paris. We chose this hotel from previous reviews on this site. From the outset we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The staff are most welcoming, as well as being friendly, pleasing and very helpful. The room we received was great, looking to the front of hotel on to a quiet little street, with excellent choice of restaurants, cafes and bars just at the top of the road. A main metro line is less than 5 minute walk away. The location of this hotel is excellent. Our room was wonderful, with great little touches to the room. There were bathrobes and slippers provided in room as well as tea/coffee making facilities, which is most unusual in parisian hotels. An excellent ensuite with large walk in shower and molton brown products sealed the deal!! The buffet breakfast was well stocked with excellent choice with something for everyone and again very pleasing staff most accommadating. I would thoroughly recommend this hotel and would return again.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Le Six
HotelInfo.Address: 14, rue Stanislas, 75006 Paris, France
